# Project Directives

Welcome to my project!

## Code Quality

These rules ensure code quality:

### typescript

# Rule: TypeScript Best Practices

## Purpose

Enforce strict typing.

## Guidelines

- Use strict mode
- Prefer interfaces

### eslint

# Rule: ESLint Configuration

## Purpose

Maintain code quality.

## Guidelines

- Use recommended rules
- Enable prettier

2. Build
3. Deploy
